document_data.name: Mulad
document_data.mainbody: '''Mulad''' was a [[sha'ir]] and the middle son of [[Al'ia bint Hazir]] and Sultan [[Yusef al-Wadi]] of [[Gana]] in the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Personality: Mulad was quite rebellious. He strove to prove to his older brother, [[Yusef]], that the powers of [[magic]] far outweighed those of the [[sword]].
document_data.Description: He had a mole under his right eye in the shape of a butterfly.
document_data.History: As with all of his siblings, Mulad's parentage was kept secret from the population of Gana. He was raised in a monastery high in [[Al-Yabki Mountains]].
